name: "All Sides: Double CD with a Personalized note from Kasim
description:
The latest release from Kasim Sulton (a double CD) is now available with a personal note from Kasim to you. See personal note options from Kasim, below. IN STOCK! SHIPS IMMEDIATELY! There’s a ton of new liner notes written by Kas, and all-new photography on the inside of the release. Click the graphic for some more “sneak peeks” of the inside artwork! This Side
  1. Someone To Love
  2. Lights On
  3. Rather Be Blind
  4. Give Him Up
  5. Drivin’ Me Mad
  6. Sacrifice
  7. All The Right Reasons
  8. Heaven’s Girl
  9. The One Sure Thing
  10. Don’t Break My Heart
  11. Oh No
  12. In The Name Of Love
  13. Over For Now
  14. Sweet Little Accident
  15. My Year
  16. Goodbye
That Side
  1. Are You Happy Now?
  2. Yellow Cab
  3. Minutes Slipping Past
  4. I Wanna Be What I Am
  5. Sometimes Love Is A Dangerous Thing
  6. Liar
  7. Love Is Blind
  8. Sweet Little Accident (Demo Version)
  9. Drivin’ Me Mad (Demo Version)
  10. Don’t Break My Heart (Demo Version)
  11. Love Alone

options.name: Other (Tell us what note should say)
